c:sourceContent.title: mac OS X 配置jdk环境变量

c:entry.c:sourceContent:
// 编辑文件 vi ~/.bash_profile
### MacOS 查看当前所有jdk版本 $ /usr/libexec/java_home -V
## 自定义 PS1 export PS1='\[\e]0;\u@\h: \w\a\]${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\[\033[01;32m\]\u@\h\[\033[00m\]:\[\033[01;34m\]\w\[\033[00m\]\$ '
## 环境变量 export JAVA_HOME=`/usr/libexec/java_home -v 1.8.0` export M2_HOME=/usr/local/maven export ARC_HOME=/Users/keesh/arcanist/arcanist #export JMETER_HOME=/usr/local/jmeter
export PATH="/opt/local/bin:/opt/local/sbin:$PATH" export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$M2_HOME/bin export PATH=$PATH:$ARC_HOME/bin export PATH="/usr/local/opt/python/libexec/bin:$PATH" export PATH=$PATH:.
export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar
#. "$HOME/.cargo/env"
// 更新配置文件 source ~/.bash_profile
